Room.Name: Amberton Lane/Oceancrest Avenue Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Amberton Lane and Oceancrest Avenue.
Room.LongDescription: Oceancrest Avenue runs east and west through the center of the town, intersecting Amberton Lane, which runs north and south. To the south, you can see the rural plains of the Bushman Farms and Estate. On the southeast is the large elven shrine dedicated to Corellon Larethian.
